summary: This document appears to be an email chain from November 2019 discussing allegations against Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. It contains descriptions of inappropriate touching and sexual misconduct by Epstein, often with Maxwell's involvement, as reported by a victim. The text references specific incidents in New York City and New Mexico.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as engaging in inappropriate touching of a victim during a movie, giving foot massages, and other sexual misconduct, often with Ghislaine Maxwell present.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Allegedly participated in and facilitated abuse, including giving nude massages and being present during inappropriate touching by Epstein.

persons.name: Mike Baker
persons.context: Appears to be forwarding or discussing allegations from a New York Times article or similar source about Epstein's misconduct.

persons.name: Brad Pitt
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of a movie ('12 Monkeys') that the victim and Epstein went to see.

connections.description: Allegedly worked together in sexual abuse and misconduct, with Maxwell facilitating and participating in abuse.
Both are described as perpetrators of abuse against the same victim, with incidents involving both together.

events.title: Movie Theater Incident in NYC
events.description: Epstein took a victim to see a movie ('12 Monkeys') in New York City and during the film began rubbing her hand, lower leg, and foot, making her uncomfortable.

events.title: Foot Massages and Abuse in New Mexico
events.description: Incidents in New Mexico involving foot massages, inappropriate touching in a movie theater, Epstein climbing into bed and spooning/touching the victim, and Maxwell giving a nude massage.

events.title: Email Discussion of Allegations
events.description: Email correspondence forwarding and discussing allegations from a New York Times article or similar source about Epstein's misconduct.

keyFacts: A victim alleges Jeffrey Epstein rubbed her hand, leg, and foot during a movie ('12 Monkeys') in New York City, making her uncomfortable and questioning his intentions.
In New Mexico, Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell engaged in multiple abusive acts including foot massages, movie theater touching, bed spooning/touching, and Maxwell giving a nude massage.
The victim expressed fear of rape and ran away during one incident involving both Epstein and Maxwell.
The document references missing nude photos of the victim with comments on her features.
The email chain from November 2019 shows ongoing discussion and forwarding of abuse allegations against Epstein and Maxwell.
